node.des: having a defect; "I returned the appliance because it was defective"
with parts removed; "the drastically cut film".
bursting open with force, as do some ripe seed vessels.
wanting to eat or drink more than one can reasonably consume.
feeling a need or desire to drink
disposed to or engaged in defiance of established authority.
the goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable).
